Dear customers,

bitFlyer was selected as a partner vendor to provide an experimental environment for Japanese Bankers Association’s (Headquarters: Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo; Chairman: Nobuyuki Hirano, Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group President) “Collaborative Blockchain Platform.”

bitFlyer’s proprietary blockchain technology “miyabi” will be used in the experiment. The Collaborative Blockchain Platform is scheduled to begin operation in October of this year.

The press release by the Japanese Bankers Association is available here (Japanese site)

The press release by bitFlyer is available here

Detailed information on our company’s blockchain “miyabi” is available here (Japanese site)
